data.text: The hotel was so old. Carpet was dirty, The dinner was awful. little dishes without taste. If this hotel is cheap you can stay, ıf you find an other hotel with same price, don't stay here. Breakfast is finishing quickly and they don't put new plate. Sahile uzak, dışarıya çıkınca gezilecek yer yok.
data.title: transit hoel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Sayın Transit,

Otelimizi tercih ettiğiniz ve geri bildirimde bulunduğunuz için çok teşekkür ederiz. Değerlendirmeye zaman ayırmanız ve otelimiz hakkında düşüncelerinizi paylaştığınız için minnettarız.

Değerlendirmedeki notlarınız için bizimle temasa geçip bilgi verirseniz çok memnun oluruz. Sizlerin görüşleri bizler için çok önemlidir. Bu durumu düzeltmek ve gidermek için önem arz ettiğini bilmenizi isteriz. 0 532 321 0276

Anemon İzmir  Otel ekibi olarak size daha iyi hizmet sağlamak ve konaklamanızı unutulmaz olmasını amaçladık. Zamanınız, ilginiz ve görüşleriniz için tekrar teşekkür eder, en yakın zamanda sizi tekrar ağırlamayı dileriz.

Saygılarımızla,

Özgür Arsoy
Anemon İzmir Otel 
Otel Muduru
owner_response.author: Anemon Manisa

data.text: I did not expect in my life to live a bad experience as it happened to me at this hotel. I booked and paid for this night and this today date for tomorrow. The room key was given before 3 hours ago, and it turned out that the air conditioner did not work and the room was very, very hot.  I had surgery in my eyes and I need to rest. However, I was treated as badly as possible, especially from the reception, as well as the room service. I am very, very sad because I adore Turkey and always love to visit it. Unfortunately, such indifferent and bullying employees reflect a negative image. I advise the hotel management to investigate the matter.  As a result of the operation, because my eyes need a cool atmosphere, not a hot one
data.title: a bad experience as it happened to me at this hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr.Yousef j;

We would like to thank you for your stay at Anemon İzmir Hotel and for your feedback 
We would like to inform you that in regards to your feedback, we take your suggestions into consideration and we take necessary actions accordingly.We highly appreciate your time for sharing your invaluable opinions 
We, as Anemon İzmir  Hotel, aimed to provide you better services, and  make your stay memorable. We  would like to thank you again for your time, attention and feedback and looking forward welcoming you again

Kind Regards,
Hotel Manager

data.text:
Our visit was more into resting point for us and we only stayed for 1 night...

Good food breakfast & dinner...
the room was super clean and comfortable.. 
In general the staff were nice and supportive however some of them showed how they were annoyed with the miss made by the kids who accompanied our group.
data.title: Clean.. comfort. Good food

data.text: Really good location and great price. Unfortunately the room stunk of smoke when we arrived which was unpleasant and some of the surfaces were dirty. Staying here for one night so it’s fine. Staff are lovely and lots of options for food and drink.
data.title: Izmir hotel
